name: Cholpon Chotaeva
bio: A Professor and Chair of the Anthropology Department of the American University of Central Asia in Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan.

name: Diana Ibanez-Tirad
bio: A doctoral researcher at the China Centre of Sussex University.

bio: An Associate Professor at the Department Of Humanities and Social Sciences of Lahore University of Management Sciences.

name: Rune Steenberg
bio: An anthropologist and human geographer based in Copenhagen and Berlin. He is also a visiting researcher at the Aga Khan University's Institute for the Study of Muslim Civilisations in London.
